Html:
Hello there,

I am fairly new to the Club Site Starter Kit, and unless I am missing something, I can't see a way to use the CMS ability of the Club Site Starter Kit, can someone maybe explain to me how to use it?

Thanks

Gary

Hi Gary,

simpy browse to e.g. www.yourdomain.com/csk/content/YourCmsPage.aspx

The data is stored into the database, don't be affraid that the page does not exists in the folder "content". We use url-rewriting and load the data from db.

Hope that helps,
Thorsten

Hello thoze,

Thanks for your help!!  It is much appreciated!!!

This worked as expected, very clever!!!

Thanks

Gary
